channel.title: How to make words in a sig!
channel.description:
Well if you want to learn the basics of making a sig you came to the right place! First you need to get C53 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,24623.0.html
A good image source is http://images.google.com
A good source for fonts is http://www.dafont.com
A good site to upload pictures is http://www.tinypic.com --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- In CS3 use ctrl+O to open a picture then click the "T" on the side menubar. Then select the font you want to use.
After you made your signature press ctrl+s and scroll and save it as a .bmp or .jpg.
Now upload your picture (I recomend http://www.tinypic.com)
This is the type of picture you can make! [IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/4zkmy4p.jpg[/img] --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]Credits:[/b] 10% Mr.Chris 90% Diablo II

item.title: How to make words in a sig!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Diablo II:

Well if you want to learn the basics of making a sig you came to the right place! First you need to get C53 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,24623.0.html

You still haven’t fixed that C53 mention. Because the number 5 is two inches away from the letter s. Of course. It’s a professional mistake, I do it all the time.

[quote=“Diablo II, post:1, topic:118034”]A good image source is
http://images.google.com[/quote]
Yes, because all the best graphics designers use the high-quality stock photos from Google Images.

[quote=“Diablo II, post:1, topic:118034”]A good site to upload pictures is
http://www.tinypic.com[/quote]
Actually a good site to upload pictures would be your own webhost. Which you should have, given your lofty graphics making skills.

[quote=“Diablo II, post:1, topic:118034”]In CS3 use ctrl+O to open a picture then click the “T” on the side menubar. Then select the font you want to use.

After you made your signature press ctrl+s and scroll and save it as a .bmp or .jpg.[/quote]
Oh yes, because .bmp isn’t ridiculously large, and .jpg never ever leaves unwanted artifacts.

Diablo II:

Now upload your picture (I recomend http://www.tinypic.com)

How much is tinypic paying you?

Diablo II:

This is the type of picture you can make! [ IMG]http://i12.tinypic.com/4zkmy4p.jpg[ /img]

Now that is something to be proud of. Oh wait. NO it isn’t. Unreadably grainy. Most people could have done a better job with paint. The image was definitely ripped off Gamespot. You love the game so much you can’t even screenshot a high quality version by yourself.

Diablo II:

Credits: 10% Mr.Chris 90% Diablo II

For the sake of Mr.Chris’ reputation, I suggest you remove his name from your credits. And good job in not making the mistake of giving yourself any of the credit here. Oh wait, yes you did, you self-aggrandizing asshole.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make words in a sig!
